segments.text: I have just had my new paper published .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? How did you get the chance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been accepted by Oxford University on PhD .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My warmest congratulations on your entering the Oxford University .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really appreciate your kind words .
segments.speaker: S1
